title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, installable via PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) enabling Ollama models as LangChain LLMs.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, multi-user support and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama written in Node.js and published to npm.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Redis, Postgres and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models as conversational agents.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama available via NuGet.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.
